page.title: 09BRIGG'S FIREMEN
page.content: All firemen in Brigg are part_time. They must live within five miles of the fire station, be at least l.73 metres tall, have a 96 centimetres chest and be physically fit. All firemen carry an alerter. A maximum of six men and a minimum of three men can ride at once on the fire engine. The fire engine at Brigg is a Dennis model which carries a l3.5 metre ladder, twenty lengths of hose and 2,5OO litres of water. The firemen must have an H.G.V. Class 3 licence to be able to drive the engine. Firemen have to learn to wear breathing apparatus to enable them to breath in smoke filled buildings. They also have to rescue people who are trapped.
